#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
 
using namespace std;
 
 
 
int main() {
int n,m,count=1;
while(scanf("%d %d\n",&n,&m)) {
if((n==0) && (m==0))
break;
if(count>1)
printf("\n");
char A[n][m];
memset(A,0+'0',sizeof(char)*n*m);
char ch;
//scanf("%c",&ch);
for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
for(int j=0;j<m;j++) {
scanf("%c",&ch);
if(ch=='*') {
A[i][j] = ch;
//cout<<"Found Mine at"<<i<<","<<j<<endl;
for(int a=max(0,i-1);a<=min(n,i+1);a++) {
for(int b=max(0,j-1);b<=min(m,j+1);b++) {
if(A[a][b]!='*'){
A[a][b]++;
}
}
}
}
// scanf("%s",A[i]);
}
scanf("%c",&ch);
}
printf("Field #%d:\n",count);
for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
for(int j=0;j<m;j++) {
printf("%c",A[i][j]);
}
printf("\n");
}
count++;
// printf("\n");
}
 
return 0;
}
